Non building-related uses: To  specify (e.g. plug-in appliances, dishwachers, TV…)
Module B7 shall include all building-integrated water-consuming processes of the building under operation such as processes for:
irrigation of associated landscape areas, green roofs, green walls;
water for heating, cooling, ventilation and humidification;
other specific water use of building-integrated systems e.g. fountains, swimming pools, saunas
If water use of appliances that are not building-related (e.g. dishwashers, washing machines) is included within the assessment, this shall be reported and communicated separately
